unnormalised: Campus hiring remains a crucial talent acquisition strategy. We at ABC Corp. have found success recruiting from IIT Delhi. This year, commencing in Q3 2024, we aim to increase our intake by 15%. We're looking for enthusiastic freshers. Dil Chahta Hai vibes are definitely welcome. Rs. 5 LPA starting salary with good career growth.
normalised: Campus hiring remains a crucial talent acquisition strategy. We at A B C Corp. have found success recruiting from I I T Delhi.
